p: Candidate drugs against COVID-19 include neuraminidase inhibitors such as Oseltamivir and Peramivir, anti-retroviral protease inhibitors like Ritonavir/Lopinavir, nucleotide analogs as Remdesivir, nucleoside inhibitors as Ribavirin, influenza hemagglutinin-mediated fusion inhibitors like Arbidol/Umifenovir and anti-malarials as Chloroquine, among others.
